Description: Painted wooden shabti of Menneferemheb with a seed-basket on the back in yellow with red details, one red hoe (?) outline on figure's left of back, one yellow with black outline on figure's right of back; green (originally blue ?) tripartite wig and collar and two vertical lines down front, with black details and a yellow fringe in brow area, and red bordered yellow background black vertical line of hieroglyphs down front identifying the deceased as a lady of the house.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Sir T J Malcolm
